articles.author: John Towfighi
articles.title: Stocks drop after Trump announces tariffs on countries including Japan and South Korea - CNN
articles.description: US stocks fell Monday as President Donald Trump announced a flurry of tariffs on countries including Japan, South Korea and South Africa.
articles.content:
US stocks fell Monday as President Donald Trump announced a flurry of tariffs on countries including Japan, South Korea and South Africa.
The Dow closed lower by 422 points, or 0.94%. The S&P 50… [+6175 chars]
